name: Doomsday (itch) (Evan4ik)
description:
Profile

DOOMSDAY is a game about being tired as hell on your first day of work.
This game was made for the second VimJam.

Controls
  • WASD or AROW KEYS to move
  • SPACE to interact
  • RMB to drink coffee and ranged attack
  • LMB for melee attack
  • ESC to bring up the menu
  • F11 to open/close fullscreen
Qualifications

You need to do your work in time, otherwise your boss will yell at you and you will loose caffeine, making you more tired. If you get too tired, you'll have to find out what happens.

You are constantly on edge, whether your caffeine is running low, or you didn't do your job in time.

Credits Programming
